page.title: 17Centre for the elderly
page.content: The centre is a day centre for Southport citizens of retirement age. It opened in 1973 as a club. Some of the people have been attending since it started. Television is popular and favourite programmes are "Connections", "Wimbledon", and "The Price is Right". Knitting and crocheting are also popular and one lady even used to go to "Keep Fit". Sometimes there are arguments over such topics as politics, television, cheating at card games and saving seats for friends, but generally they all get on well like one big happy family.
